long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A bookmark extension for Geeks!! ðŸ¤“

Geekmark allows users to specify bookmark rules with commands and URLs. ðŸ”–

Hit g. Type in your rule command and Voila!! Extension will take you to your bookmarked URL.

Features:
* Easily navigate to most used sites by simply typing a shorthand command for that site.
* Specify smart rules useful in case when a url has a pattern. 
* Ability to fuzzy search so that you don't even have to type the full value and extension figures
out what is intended.

Examples: (After the appropriate rules are configured)
1. Typing "mail" takes you to "https://google.com/mail"
2. Typing "mail inbox" takes you to "https://google.com/mail/u/0/#inbox"
3. Typing "mail sent" takes you to "https://google.com/mail/u/0/#sent"
4. Typing "mail ib" takes you to "https://google.com/mail/u/0/#inbox"
5. Typing "repo mat" takes you to "https://github.com/mui/material-ui"
and so on ...
